name: Myket co.
description:
• Developed Myket developers-panel frontend using Angular framework.
  • Created chat system for Myket application using React.JS framework
  • Added ticketing-panel using Angular framework.
  • Created several campaign web-pages using Vanilla Js.
  • Added services to the developers panel such as Google Analytics, FCM, Sentry, Clarity.

name: Portfolio website
description:
• Designed the portfolio website in new modern user-friendly techniques.
  • Developed the portfolio website as a Single-page Application, regarding clean code principles.

name: «Ma Hastim» News Website
description:
• Created a responsive landing page for a news website from the desired photoshop design using Html, CSS and Vanilla Js.
  • Built website pages in clean and optimum way to maintain readability and prevent repetitive coding.

name: Trustply co.
description:
• Developed Trustply website using Angular and Typescript frameworks.
  • Created responsive and functional user interfaces with Html, CSS and Bootstrap, that allowed cross-platform accessibility to the website on all mediums and screen sizes.
  • Collaborated with back-end developers, designers and QA testers.
  • Translated visual designs to simple and clean codes.

name: «Rosha Azma» Medical Website
description:
• Built a WooCommerce website using Wordpress
  • Customized user interface using Html and CSS.
